responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "6D44A6F742A13D35E8DAEB9C141546F2", "Every opposition has a weakness. In this case, the Forsaken Blades would be a disorganized group of hillfolk if not for their military training. We can\'t let more of our soldiers rally behind an alternative which doesn\'t exist. The only path to peace and order is with the Empire, and any resistance must be brought down with force.")
name: CSQ_RVR_0081_FB_NordenResnick_DLG_17
